website_summaries.verdict: A great budget option for anyone needing a quick replacement or secondary cord that delivers average file transfer and charging speeds.
pros: USB 3.1 compatibility for quicker transfer speeds
A durable outer coating will survive common mishaps like getting stepped on
cons: The cord won’t function with non-computer devices like external hard drives or musical equipment

customer_reviews.title: Data transfer from Nexus 5X to Windows 10 PC frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to transfer data from phone to PC. No matter what I've tried, debugging mode, rebooting, new drivers, etc., it will not recognize any data on the phone. It recognizes it as a portable media device named "Nexus 5X" but says the device is empty. It does charge the phone. However, this is useless to me. UPDATE: I left my phone connected for to the PC for about an hour today and went to check on a phone notification with the pull-down and found a 5-item menu for the USB connection. The third choice was "Transfer Files". I really wish I'd discovered this sooner. I've had this cable for a month, but now, all is well.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: These cables actually do fix connection issues with Android Auto
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a recommendation when I was having issues with my Android Auto on my Pioneer Headunit. I didnt really think it would be more effective than my Samsung Note 10+'s factory supplied USB cable. I was WRONG. This Cable Matters USB Cable is WAAAY better quality. As soon as I plugged it in Android Auto turned right on and stayed on like its supposed to. Cable Matters is now totally on my radar for high quality poducts
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baldassari

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved, Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.text: Cables can be confusing. Selecting one with the proper connections is not enough. The cable must also be able to carry the load required to transfer the power from the charging unit to the appliance being charged. This cable may be very good when used correctly. I was looking for a charging cable for my 2017 Mackbook Pro. This cable will not work for that. Cable Matters customer service was very good to me, explaining the problem and recommending the proper cable. Problem solved, Lesson learned! If you are unsure contact the company and ask the experts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D Turner

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my Android Auto disconnecting problem
customer_reviews.text: When Android Auto was disconnecting in my 2018 Civic using the OEM Samsung cable, I had to find a better cable. This product works very well, with no disconnect issues. It also seems pretty durable in the areas where the wire attaches to the connectors. I recommend this product if you are experiencing issues connecting to your car because it fixed this problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to sync and charge my Google Pixel ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to sync and charge my Google Pixel 2. Plugging it into an HP Envy laptop and the phone, the computer never recognized the phone. Had to resort to a microusb cable and a microusb to usb c converter to get it recognized. Also when charging, using a "rapid charge" capable charger, the phone only "charges" not "charges rapidly". Don't know if I just don't know how to push the plugs in to get the computer to recognize the phone or what. BUt the cable does work for charging...
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: It's about what you should expect from a high quality USB 3c cable. Feels sturdy but easily flexible. I like the strain relief design on these cables a lot more than the mesh and corrugated designs. These aren't needlessly bulky on the ends and the material is easy to grip. The metal on the plugs is well finished; no sharp edges. I'll update if the cable reveals any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hoblit

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a little over a month, then didn't
customer_reviews.text: Used this in the car to primarily connect to Android Auto, and also to charge my Pixel 4 phone. Worked great for about a month, then all I'd get is a "No Device Connected". Charging still works, so it's just the signal from my phone to the car that stopped. I hadn't changed any settings, but reinstalled Android Auto anyway and re-checked all settings but no go.
customer_reviews.author: OctoberLady

customer_reviews.title: *replacement cable compliant! Nice
customer_reviews.text: After reading the recommendation from Googler Benson, I ordered the cable for my nexus 5x. Plugged into the phone and computer, launched checkr app, and got a big red X.Looks like cable matters still selling the non-compliant version thru Amazon Update. Cable matters sent a replacement cable and it tests fine. Cable is thick and looks like quality
customer_reviews.author: joeyl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of receiving old/non-compliant stock and test your cable
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly Cable Matters has revised their cables to meet the correct USB spec, but the cable I got was non-compliant according to the CheckR Android app. I ordered this cable on November 20 2015, right after reading Benson's updated review. It seems to me like Cable Matters is still selling some of their defective stock to unsuspecting buyers, so I would caution you to wait until the stock is completely of the revised cables. See my attached screen-shot showing what the CheckR app shows (a red "X" USB icon). I have tested using this cable on my Nexus 6P with both my USB 3 and USB 2 ports on my desktop computer.
customer_reviews.author: Gamearts

customer_reviews.title: This is the USB cable you need for your note 10
customer_reviews.text: The only cable I have that has consistently worked to connect my galaxy note 10 plus to my car for Android auto. The oem cable and all others I've tried go in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Npetra1

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Why motorola didn't give me one of these when I bought their phone I'll never know. I mean you pay that much for it and all you can do is plug it into the wall to charge it. This will let me charge it (with low power) from the USB port on my desktop. Plus I can move pictures and video around without emailing it to myself of messing around with the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Best short USB cord available
customer_reviews.text: These cables were the shortest length I could find, which makes them useful for battery pack recharging of cellphones - the wire plus pack fit comfortably in a pants pocket. The cord also works as a replacement for the original cellphone charging cord without giving up the "fast charge" benefit of the OEM equipment.
customer_reviews.author: David Witzel

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months, then quit
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple of months the cables worked perfectly. No issues. Lately, the cables have started to fail and have problems with both my Galaxy phone and both of my Samsung external SSDs. Seems to be the USB-C end that causes the problems.
customer_reviews.author: R. Badger

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Works
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this cable. I've used it to connect and/or power my phone through the wall, car, and computer. I have found that charging in a car or from a computer is wickedly slow.; hours compared to 20 minutes through a wall charger. Computer transfer is quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great USB-C cable for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my new Samsung Note 10+ for both charging and data streaming such as with Android Auto!
customer_reviews.author: THIS IS SPARTA !!!!!

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a fast charging cable but it quit working after a few months. I had it pluged up by my night stand so l didn't move it a lot
customer_reviews.author: SheilaRae74

customer_reviews.title: Works for Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my vehicle to connect a Pixel 2 to a audio device. So far it works just fine. The value was great for this item. Too early to comment on durability. Seems like a solid buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dav

customer_reviews.title: Works with Note 10 and Android Auto
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy three different cords including one from Samsung before finding this cord that actually works with my note 10+ and my dodge Challenger Android Auto. Only cord that has worked for me
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoSlim

customer_reviews.title: It's A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It feels and looks like a good quality cable. It was packaged in a resealable bag...nice for untangled storage. It worked great for transferring data between a PC and a OP6, while charging the phone from the PC. It worked with a generic battery pack to charge a OP6 as well (obviously not at Dash Charging speed).
customer_reviews.author: LinXX MiDoups

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: First one did not fast charge. Contacted the company who quickly replaced it with the new version that does quick charge. If you have a nexus 6p, download CheckR and verify yours works for fastcharge. If it does not, they will quickly replace it with no hassles. New one works great.
customer_reviews.author: tbm

customer_reviews.title: Good cable when it connects properly
customer_reviews.text: Cable works well when it connects properly. Doesn't always get a good connection with phone. Multiple tries are needed to avoid this error message on phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R. Preger

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I had tons of cables, some of them either don't work well in fast charge (Samsung devices), or Quick Charge 3.0, and those who worked - didn't work well (or reliably well) for data transfer (specially on sensitive stuff like ADB). After getting this cable I tested this cable on both charge modes (Fast and QC 3.0) as well as data - and it works really, really well! I purchased 2 and I plan to purchase few more.
customer_reviews.author: Hetz Ben Hamo

customer_reviews.text: Durability and Sturdiness? Won't know that for quite a while. Good cable, good length, a little thinner than some so it's nice and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: SHELDON E SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a quality cable with resistor.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this type cable with a limiting resistor. It works. No problems. Will be used as a spare, back up cable. This is the place to buy this kind of cable. The store prices are ridiculously high.
customer_reviews.author: OneGalsOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Not a "fast charging" cable. It works though.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's meant to do. However, this is not a fast-charging cable. When I took this with me over seas (I used it on an airplane and where I was staying) my Nexus 5x took forever to charge. I didn't realize how fast the original Nexus 5x wall adapter is. Since I don't really have a need for it now that I'm back from my trip, I'm too lazy to return it. I might hang on to it for future trips as an emergency cable.
customer_reviews.author: Kian

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This cable looks ok. It fast charges well. Transfer data well. The first 3 I recieved broke in short order. But they contacted me and sent 3 new ones. They are working.
customer_reviews.author: William McCarver

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, they shipped out a new USB-C spec compliant cable after originally receiving a non-compliant one.
customer_reviews.text: I originally received old stock with a non-compliant 10kohm resistor not up to USB-C spec which is potentially dangerous for your equipment. However, Cable Matters reached out to me strongly apologizing for the inconvenience and offered me a replacement cable. So the replacement cable arrived today and fortunately I can now say that I received a spec compliant cable with the proper 56kohm resistor. So all in all I am very thankful for their customer service and willingness to resolve my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Does Not Work :-(
customer_reviews.text: I'm technically savvy... I plugged this into my OEM Samsung charger and my Samsung S8+ ... and nothing happens. P. O. S. Does not work. Not worth returning. Ugghh.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Cardiff

customer_reviews.title: Fast charges Nokia 6.1 (2018)
customer_reviews.text: Likes: - The cable I received fast charged (peak measured current of 2.7A) my Nokia 6.1 (2018) with the Nokia supplied charger and my other 2 Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 chargers. - USB-C connector fits the phone charging port snugly, not too tight. Dislikes: None!
customer_reviews.author: Green Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty cable. It has a quality feel. The USB-C connection is a little tight, but that's probably a good thing. It's small, so I am sure it will loosen up over time with my new smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Lunix

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Works grate, didint run a bench mark on speed but it moves large video files quickly will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Da vinci

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with RAVpower charger
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a RAVpower wall charger. The cable makes a very poor connection when it is inserted all the way. My phone cycles continuously between "charging" and unplugged. I have to pull the USB cable out of the charger by an 1/8 of an inch to maintain "charging."
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Urteaga

customer_reviews.title: I saw Benson Leung's review and I thought I'd be ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw Benson Leung's review and I thought I'd be getting a compliant cable, but I checked it today with CheckR for piece of mind and I ended up getting a non-compliant cable. If you're looking at buying this, just be careful and make sure to check if i's compliant. Edit: The problem was cleared up. Apparently the CheckR app isn't working properly. I would trust that this cable is compliant (As Benson Leung gave his approval.)
customer_reviews.author: Samer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied and Recommend "Cable Matters" for great product and service
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the service and am happy with this product, in fact, I reordered this cable again to use on another location because of the quality of the cable and I recommend this product, and the company that provides it.
customer_reviews.author: E. RAY AUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: Kind of works
customer_reviews.text: Transfers data quickly. Unfortunately it doesn't seem to be compatible with my Hyundai head unit for android auto or charging.
customer_reviews.author: shoe wearer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work just great looks good too
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in my LG G6 in with this cable to the charger it came with charging fast charge. 4% says 1hour 36 mins.... Seems to work just great looks good too, better than the one the phone came with. Except it's only 3.1 Gen 1 not 2 but when the speeds are that fast who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Lexo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cable came as expected, which is good. I just needed an extra one for my office so this was perfect. I thought it was a lightning one at first, i did not properly read description. But i still use it and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: Old stock may still be in circulation... Check your cable for compliance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cable largely because Google's Benson Leung reported that this cable met the necessary USB Type C specs. However, when I tested the cable that I received from Amazon.com, it did not meet pass the tests. When I e-mailed Cable Matters (support@cablematters.com), they responded right away and agreed to replace the noncompliant cables that I received. The replacement cables that I received from Cable Matters passed the Checkr test without any issue. This is a very nice cable. The connectors feel strong and the cable feels solid. And Cable Matters customer service is great; they even responded to my e-mails on Thanksgiving day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Work great for my Ergodox Infinity Mechanical Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for an Ergodox Infinity keyboard kit, and works like a charm. These are one of the preferred cables by Input Club, the designers of the keyboard model I built and I am very happy. Pricing and reliability make this a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cables
customer_reviews.text: I'm making a full transition to USB-C and have purchased almost every single USB-C cable from Cable Matters. They're excellent and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cable
customer_reviews.text: Felt like a decent quality cable but stopped working with only moderate use. 2-3 times a week and only in my car. Just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's been tough finding a cable connects power and data to my galaxy s9 plus. This one does and it appears well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McKalip

customer_reviews.title: Good with Google Pixel, But No Quick Charging
customer_reviews.text: This cable works great for the price (transfers data and all of that with my Google Pixel phone), but be advised it will not do quick charging. Update: Also worth noting that this charger does not fit into my phone when the phone is in its case, which I got from Carved. The rubber around the insert is bigger than on the official google brand cable, and so cases that are designed to fit the google brand cable may have openings that are too small for this cable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gocek

customer_reviews.title: Benson approved
customer_reviews.text: Benson approved and works well with my OP3T. Somewhat thick cables, which I prefer. It should be noted that one cable came severely bent with a kink, but as expected of Amazon I got an easy exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Built well and supports quick charge
customer_reviews.text: Been going a couple months strong. I wish it was 6ft, but finally found a cheap Type C cable that feels good and does quick charging (LG G6). Will update immediately if they go bad.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cable
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a few days now. Is that enough time to give a cable a review? Durability? How would I know? So far so good, eh?
customer_reviews.author: Ray C. Freeman III

customer_reviews.title: Works to hard reset Apple TV gen4
customer_reviews.text: It works! Had to hard reset my Apple TV generation 4 because of a failed software update. I needed this cable cuz apple does not provide one upon purchase. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTX

customer_reviews.title: feel great and are durable
customer_reviews.text: These provide a solid connection, have flexible cables, feel great and are durable.
customer_reviews.author: anthony daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works for Spare Battery to Phone Charging
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to charge my HTC-10 from my spare battery to the phone, which is why I purchased this. It allowed fast charging.
customer_reviews.author: Washed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a car or something that needs a super short cord length.
customer_reviews.author: Drew N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Android charger cable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few times now too have enough for all the phones and tablets in the house (6 at last count) and in our vehicles. Great charger cable for Android devices both 1.0 or 2.0 amp.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry about getting an out-of-spec cable, Cable Matters will make it right.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the cable I used the CheckR app to see if the cable was compliant. The test failed so I contacted Cable Matters. They are more than aware that Amazon still has the old version in stock and were extremely quick to send me a new cable. Received the new cable very fast and checked it with CheckR. Compliant! Very happy with the cable and Cable Matters for being so prompt with sending a new cable!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cable
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is a good working length for me. Data throughput is not something I've tested as I bought it to replace one I lost in South Africa. I couldn't fine a replacement anywhere down there.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Works great...but remember it doesn't support fast charge!
customer_reviews.text: The cable is not going to fast charge a device but works if you do not have a USB-C cable or port around. It is of a good build quality and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Tauber

customer_reviews.title: A solid cable for connecting to older USB devices
customer_reviews.text: This is a good USB type A to USB type C cable. It meets the USB type C spec, and I use it to charge my Nexus 5X and connect it to my PC. The cable seems to be exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: They work fine and will say "charging rapidly" when plugged in to ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using these chargers with our old iphone usb wall adapters to charge our Nexus 5X phones. They work fine and will say "charging rapidly" when plugged in to our ipad chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Great all arounder - Pixel XL
customer_reviews.text: Benson approved Fast transfer speed Support for rapid charging on Pixel XL (paired with QC 2.0 wall adapter) Solid connector tip (preferred over OEM pixel cable)
customer_reviews.author: Cars and Tech by JDM City

customer_reviews.title: Quality built cord
customer_reviews.text: Fits tightly and strongly built. I like it for the car because the cord is shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Flower

customer_reviews.title: Love Cable Matters
customer_reviews.text: Recently discovered cable matters and there products are top notch. Will continue to purchase the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cote

customer_reviews.title: Works great for moving huge files.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for charging data syncing and moving large files.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: High quality/value
customer_reviews.text: Seriously high quality, allowed my phone to work with android auto (other cables didnt) would definitely recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Munira Q

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cable is sturdy and the connection fits snug as expected. I'll be buying another longer one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ew

customer_reviews.title: great brand, solid product
customer_reviews.text: Great cables -- I've ordered several sizes and types (USB-A mini, micro, USB C, etc) and have never had a problem. All are excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Woods

customer_reviews.title: These Suck!!
customer_reviews.text: These are USB-C, white, heavy-type cables, and neither one of the 2 I ordered worked. It's not worth returning them, but they are NOT worth buying either...
customer_reviews.author: glb

customer_reviews.title: The new cable worked like a charm and working with Cable Matters support was ...
customer_reviews.text: The first cable I received was one of their old cables that had problems. The new cable worked like a charm and working with Cable Matters support was awesome. Thanks Cable Matters!
customer_reviews.author: S. Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Fast transfers. Works with fast charging on my Note 8 if it's hooked up to a proper source (car charger, wall charger).
customer_reviews.author: Sunagwa

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and good.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these, nicely put together and does the job. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge rapidly in more than 10 circumstances. Does not meet transfer spec.
customer_reviews.text: Hey - contract developer for Android kernels here. First place, these cables do not transfer at their advertised speeds. I tested them on custom systems (ASUS motherboards, mostly) on USB-2 and USB-3 ports. They do not meet the standard. Tested them on a Dell 9550, M1330, and XPS 1550 - they do not transfer at the standard and do not charge rapidly. I tested them on Anker car and wall chargers - nope. As opposed to the stock Google cable, which has no problem with sustained USB-2 speeds and charges rapidly in every instance. Do not buy this cable if you want high speed transfers. Do not buy this cable if you want to charge rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: the speed is amazing and the cable is nice and tight
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my HTC10 since it only came with a 2.0 cable, the speed is amazing and the cable is nice and tight, it works with QC3.0 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Smith

customer_reviews.title: A letdown but not for why you think...
customer_reviews.text: Charges, but does not support 'Charging Rapidly' on Nexus 5x. Wish it had stated that in description. A USB A-to-C cable should ***never*** support fast charging on the 5X and 6P.
customer_reviews.author: ANerd

customer_reviews.title: Quality cable that is no different than the OEM cable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Left my charger at work after buying the S10e. Was worried about fast charging issues but this thing works like a champA
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Baltezore JR

customer_reviews.title: Solid well build cable.
customer_reviews.text: Solid well built cable. I'm not a fan of the strain relief, it seems insufficient and the color is odd, but it doesn't pose a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MyItchyChin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well made cable. Not much else to say. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: TheDroidYou'reLookingFor

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised, dunno what else to say about it as it's just a cable and it charges my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. It's a cable, what else can I say other than it does what it's supposed to do and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lohocla

customer_reviews.title: Ending was too bulky
customer_reviews.text: The plug is a little too bulky. It didn't fit through the protective cover on my cell phone. So, I had to shave the ending with a sharp knife to make it fit. Otherwise, it worked good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: connects!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected - no issues. Appears to be well made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: 12lives

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived on time. No problems using for data and charging with Pixel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: As Desired - Tough Wehre They All Break
customer_reviews.text: Great choice if tired of charging cables breaking at the connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Spice Concoction

customer_reviews.title: Works fine in my car
customer_reviews.text: Powers my cell phone while driving. So far, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is high quality, good protect at stress points on each end of the connectors.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Cable
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality cable. Own four because it works and charges very fast. 100% would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rafael O. Davila

customer_reviews.title: Good cable, worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does what its supposed to, haven't had any issues after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ray - Jealous Records

customer_reviews.title: not black (so maybe it's easy to tell if you just ordered and got the ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: after posting a negative review about non-compliant cables, Cable Matters contacted me and replaced them free of charge. The new cables are white, not black (so maybe it's easy to tell if you just ordered and got the older non-compliant version) and pass the compliance test. Excellent customer service on Cable Matters behalf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine i will get another
customer_reviews.text: Good cable works with old usb 2 charger bases as well as new bases. They seem to have sturdy connection ends. All around solid cable
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Cables that work
customer_reviews.text: After buying cables at Best Buy that cost more than 3 times as much and never worked properly, these are a great find at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Woody1352

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Functions exactly as expected. Not sure what else to say in a review of a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Darius

customer_reviews.title: Great cable to extend the distance for my wavlink dual ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cable to extend the distance for my wavlink dual dock from my Mac Pro. Also great speed transfer through 3.0.
customer_reviews.author: WinnieTabz

customer_reviews.title: Good solid cable
customer_reviews.text: Good solid cables...work great for charging and data transfers on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: First cable was not fully compatible with nexus 6p but the replacement is working fine.
customer_reviews.text: Cable matters quickly rectified a problem with the first cable they shipped to me. First cable was not fully compatible with nexus 6p but the replacement is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great charger cables they are one of the first ones that will charge my samsung without any problems
customer_reviews.author: suki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Eextremely durable and well made. I love the length which makes this cord very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Mr X

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well good quailty not that chinese knock off stuff and I'm and American born Chinese too.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it worked well. That's all I wanted...
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Works with Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: Works great to transfer files from my Pixel 2 to my computer
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Nexus 6P
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality USB-C cable, exactly as described. I've been buying cables from Cable Matters for a long time and I'm really impressed with their products. The wire cable like it's made of good quality materials and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 months - manufacture warranty is impossible to find. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe this device did not make it even half a year. Do not purchase unless you can buy 10 of them in bulk. Cheaply built.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Yan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Most of usb type c cords on Amazon stop being compatible with my device and slow charges but this one is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Katherina Charles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and performance for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Cable Matters makes well performing products at affordable prices. So far, this is my experience and these cables have not proven any different.
customer_reviews.author: mr.goodguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very well constructed cable to charge my phone via PC USB.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job of charging my phone
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of charging my phone (Nexus 6P). The wired connection does not fray after abuse. I have been transporting cable in my pocket connected to battery-pack...no negative issues.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bot

product_meta.title: Cable Matters USB-C Cable (USB A to C Cable, USB C to USB Cable) in Black 3.3 Feet for Samsung Galaxy S20, S20+, S20 Ultra, Note 10, Note 10+, LG G8, V50, Google Pixel 4, and More
feature_bullets: USB C TO USB A CABLE provides connectivity from a host computer, wall charger, or external power bank with a USB A port to a tablet or smartphone for USB Type C cable fast charging

LEGACY COMPANION USB A to USB C Cable syncs data and charges between newly released devices and legacy computers with Type A; USB C charger cable supports the USB 3.1 data transfer rate up to 5 Gbps with backwards compatibility to USB 3.0 and 2.0; Connect to an external hard drive for extremely fast data transfers with this USB C to USB Cable

MANAGE THE MIGRATION to connect new devices with a USB-C port to current devices with this USB to USB C cable; USB Type-C Cable supports Target Disk Mode between the 2015 MacBook and an older MacBook with a USB 3.0 port for transferring files

MANAGE THE MIGRATION to connect new devices with a USB-C port to current devices with this USB to USB C cable; USB Type-C Cable supports Target Disk Mode between the 2015 MacBook and an older MacBook with a USB 3.0 port for transferring files

ENGINEERED TO LAST USB-C charger cable with a flexible cable, sturdy construction, and USB connectors with molded strain relief for frequent unplugging; USB C Charging Cable is fully shielded to provide superior transmission performance and project against EMI/RFI noise; Reversible USB Type C charger cable clicks into place for a snug and secure connection; Lifetime warranty and product support for this cable provides peace of mind when purchasing this USBC to USB cable
